title: NOW i know why people HATE ranked
body:
8 losses IN A ROW
2 DEMOTIONS 1 DAY.
im actually so fking done with this. i have shit people or "smurfs" who cant play for ****. WTF RIOT. i WANT 1 GOOD TEAM just once 2day. 8 losses in a row, and i was doing rly well in some of them. wtf. i got objectives i helped other lanes, but no the 1-11 annie with the viktor with 800 ap at lv 9 in lane. this is ridiculous. wtf. had countless trolls 2day. 4 afk 1 game on my team. 3 feeders on my team. no mia. people who say nothing and act like bots all game. people chase the tank and die. people diving at lv 2. wtf

replies.body:
I havent  started playing ranked...but I think ill only hit like once or twice a week...I dont know, maybe riot matches you with harder players when youre on a winning streak....either ways..Anyone any tips for  winning provy thingys....??{{champion:45}} ...Feed me!

....To the guy who is loosing so many ranked games...Whats your division and wanna duo..lols!
If you lose more than two games in a row take a break, go for a walk or play a different game, only come back when you are ready to lose.

Yeah well the streaks come and go. I lost about 7 out of 9 games early saturday then won 11 of the next 12. Some games I had feeding teams, others afks and in a couple I played like shit. Such is life.

I never WANTED to play ranked. I tried a bit of it back on the NA servers in seasons 2-3 but gave it up as a waste of time and was perfectly happy just playing draft normals- all the gameplay depth, half the stress.

Then I transferred out to the OCE server, as we all did, only for Riot to pull Draft Normals out from under us for *particularly* moronic reasons a few months later, leaving ranked as the ONLY non-shit mode left in the game (blind pick is for scrubs). I've never forgiven them and, unless they reinstate it, I never will.

Wow man, that sucks.
Yeah ive been having "Smurfs" alot in my games too.

Its just a bad streak, you probably went on Tilt.
Rest up, and give it a go later.
^ I havent been playing ranked today because I noticed I was going on Tilt and decided not to play.

You can only go up.
No use saying wtf riot its not their fault plus theres nothing they can do about player behaviour unless you report them
